title: ESM Collection Specification
description: This object represents Collections in a Earth System Model Catalog.

catalog_dict.title: An array of dictionaries that represents the data that would otherwise be in the csv.

column_name.title: Column Name
column_name.description: The name of the column containing the path to the asset.

format_column_name.title: Format Column Name
format_column_name.description: The column name which contains the data format.

variable_column_name.title: Variable Column Name
variable_column_name.description: Name of the attribute column in csv file that contains the variable name.

groupby_attrs.title: Group by attributes
groupby_attrs.description: Column names (attributes) that define data sets that can be aggegrated.

aggregations.title: Aggregation operations
aggregations.description: List of aggregations to apply to query results

column_name.title: Column Name
column_name.description: Name of the attribute column in the assets csv file.

vocabulary.title: Vocabulary
vocabulary.description: Link to the controlled vocabulary for the attribute in the format of a URL.

agg_type.title: Type of aggregration
agg_type.description: Type of aggregation operation to apply.

attribute_name.title: Name of attribute
attribute_name.description: Name of attribute across which to aggregate.

options.title: Options
options.description: Optional aggregration settings that are passed as keywords arguments to xarray.concat or xarray.merge. For `join_existing`, must contain something like {'dim': 'time'}.
